actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to reinstate the 6-month hospitalization, institutional, or domiciliary care period required prior to reducing the stipend of a pensioner who has no dependents.

summary.text: Extends from two to six months the hospitalization, institutional, or domiciliary care period required prior to reduction of the stipend of a pensioner who has no dependents.

titles.title: A bill to reinstate the 6-month hospitalization, institutional, or domiciliary care period required prior to reducing the stipend of a pensioner who has no dependents.
